stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 8 credits on it. When it is empty, trash it. Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.
text:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] on it. When it is empty, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.
title: Bank Job
